title: Bixby Voice UK: A quick-fire guide to the Galaxy Note 8's new AI assistant
description: ![bixby]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * And given that the Galaxy Note 7 launch went, quite literally, up in flamesfor Samsung, it comes as little surprise that the chaebol is bringing a fullarsenal to the Note 8 launch.Related: [Samsung Galaxy S9](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s9-release-date-specs-features-price-uk-3266552)For the unaware, Bixby is effectively a reboot of the S Voice assistant appthat launched back in 2012 with the Galaxy S3. It’s similar to Amazon’s Alexasoftware, in that in can be controlled using voice and perform simple taskslike setting an alarm or retrieving a local weather forecast.Global mobile rollout of Bixby Voice represents the first step in Samsung’sassault on the increasingly crowded AI assistant space.Additional Samsung devices – included the Family Hub 2.0 refrigerators – areunderstood to be getting a Bixby upgrade in the future.**Related:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)****Who’s your favourite digital assistant? Siri, Cortana, Google Assistant,Alexa, Bixby, or someone else entirely? Let us know via Facebook or Twitter.**
